spell.name: Maker's Gift
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to drive your creative crafting powers. When you Cast the Spell, you Recall Knowledge (Crafting), Repair, or Craft. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill check. The bonus is applied any time you take one of the action, as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Maker's Gift

spell.name: Lesser Maker

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Maker, you choose to replicate Mending, Temporary Tool, or Dismantle. Lesser Maker gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Maker.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.greater: You may cast Lesser Maker up to two times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.grand: You may cast Lesser Maker up to three times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Lesser Maker any number of times per daily preparation.
